name: To The Beat
description:
Cool and fun rhythm game. Push the keys in time with the music. Build a streak to increase your score. Add modifiers for a fun challenge.

Game works best with keyboard, but does have Gamepad support.

The following music was used in the production of this game.

Epic Cyberpunk | GLORY | by Alex-Productions | https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCx0_M61F81Nfb-BRXE-SeVA

Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
